tool_description: Calculates comprehensive engagement metrics including likes, shares, comments, and derived metrics like engagement rate and virality score.

likes_counts.description: Array of like counts for each post

shares_counts.description: Array of share counts for each post

comments_counts.description: Array of comment counts for each post

followers_counts.description: Array of follower counts for each post author

platform_weights.description: Array of platform-specific weight multipliers for engagement calculation

time_decay_factor.description: Factor for time-based decay of engagement scores (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All count arrays must have the same length
Empty arrays: At least one post worth of data must be provided
Negative values not allowed: All count values must be non-negative integers
Time decay factor out of range: time_decay_factor must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Platform weights length mismatch: platform_weights array must match the length of other arrays if provided
Too many posts: Maximum 10000 posts allowed per calculation
usage: Provide arrays of engagement counts (likes, shares, comments) and follower counts. Optionally specify platform weights and time decay factor. Returns comprehensive engagement metrics.

engagement_rates.description: Array of engagement rates (0.0-100.0) for each post

total_engagements.description: Array of total engagement counts for each post

virality_scores.description: Array of virality scores (0.0-100.0) for each post

average_engagement_rate.description: Average engagement rate across all posts

top_performing_indices.description: Array of indices of top 10 performing posts
